titleStmt.title: The nature of justification opened in a sermon on Romans V. 1. By Mr. Gibbons, sometime preacher at Black-Fryers, London.
titleStmt.author: Gibbon, John, 1629-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns in Chepside, near Mercer's-Chappel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Trinity College Library, Dublin.
